TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Welcome
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
Hi, I'm Rio. You look like you could use some help!

Sword Girls is about collecting all the best cards,

building impressive decks, conquering fearsome

dungeon bosses, and outplaying your opponents.

I've given you some free Tokens and Materials

as a welcome gift! Click START to begin the tutorial.

It's also your first Quest!

TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Card Type
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
There are three kinds of cards in Sword Girls:

Character - The hero. Primary focus and

there must be one in each deck.

Follower - The fighter. Features 3 stats:

Attack (ATK), Defense (DEF), and Stamina (STA).

Spell - The support. Powerful buffs for allies

and debuffs for enemies.

TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Card Size
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
Followers and Spells have a SIZE in the upper-right

corner of the card. During each turn, you can play

cards until you reach a total SIZE of 10. A Follower

card's SIZE determines how much LIFE a Character

will lose from either a direct attack or when an allied

Follower is defeated.

TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Main Phase
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
During the Main Phase, you play cards from

your Hand and place them in the Field. Your Hand

consists of 5 cards and is refilled every turn.

Be aware of the maximum Field size of 10. Click

SHUFFLE if you would like to swap the current

cards in your Hand with cards from your Deck.

You can only SHUFFLE twice per match.

TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Battle Phase
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
During the Battle Phase, Spell cards always

activate first and then Followers proceed to attack.

Followers will always counterattack if they survive

the initial attack. Pay attention to the SIZE of

Follower cards; if they are defeated,

the Character loses LIFE equal to the SIZE of their

allied Follower.

TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Main Menu
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
Everything in Sword Girls starts here.

DUNGEON - Hunt down bosses.

FIGHT - Battle against other players.

SHOP - Purchase cards and items.

DECK - Browse your collection and build decks

LAB - Crafting, exchanging, training, and more.

Click "?" on the top left of each menu for details.

TUTORIAL_PAGE.TITLE: Success!
TUTORIAL_PAGE.MSG:
Tutorial quest complete! Click QUEST on the

bottom right to claim your rewards. Visit the

DECK to get familiar with your Starter Deck

and bonus cards. When you are ready to enter

your first battle, explore the Beginner Dungeon.

For more detailed information, click HELP

to view the full game guide.
